title: Getting Started with Quarkus Messaging and Apache Pulsar
summary: This guide covers how to use Quarkus Messaging to interact with Apache Pulsar. It includes building two applications: a producer that sends quote requests and a processor that responds with quotes. It demonstrates the creation of Maven projects, handling of Pulsar topics via Reactive Messaging, and interactions through server-sent events. The guide also provides details on running applications in both JVM and native modes using Docker, and it includes links to Pulsar's documentation for extended configurations.
